feed.title: Willow Creek (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Willow Creek (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:31 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Claresholm 02:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -10.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -12.9°C
Wind: NNE 21 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:47 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:47 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:47 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
